title: Inflation rate in Lithuania 2024
yAxis: Inflation rate compared to previous year
summary: Overall Inflation rate compared to previous year has increased over the Year.

The line significantly increased by 1.52 from Year 2004 to 2005,increased by 5.41 from Year 2007 to 2008,decreased by 2.97 from Year 2009 to 2010,increased by 2.93 from Year 2010 to 2011,decreased by 0.92 from Year 2013 to 2014,increased by 0.44 from Year 2014 to 2015, and lastly, increased by 3.04 from Year 2016 to 2017.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2008 and 2009.
The highest Inflation rate compared to previous year, of value 11.16 was reached at Year 2008
Minimum Inflation rate compared to previous year about 0.24 was reached at Year 2014
min_summary: In general Inflation rate compared to previous year has rose over the Year.
